sections.tag: NO DIA A DIA DO AUTOMOTIVO
sections.title: Contabilidade consultiva para concessionárias, oficinas e centros automotivos
paragraphs: Concessionárias e oficinas lidam com rotinas complexas: vendas e pós-venda, peças e serviços, ordens de serviço, garantias, comissões, controle de estoque e diferentes tributações por operação. Sem um financeiro e uma contabilidade alinhados, a margem se perde em detalhes e o caixa vira surpresa.

A Malaquias estrutura sua contabilidade com foco em gestão e resultado. Integramos fiscal, contábil e financeiro para organizar processos, melhorar controles, reduzir riscos e entregar relatórios práticos que ajudam na precificação, no giro de estoque e na análise de rentabilidade por área.

sections.title: Cresça com previsibilidade: filiais, novas unidades e padronização de rotinas
paragraphs: Abrir uma nova unidade, ampliar a operação ou organizar o pós-venda exige padronização e governança. Sem rotinas claras, a empresa perde controle sobre estoque, custos, comissões e impostos — e o crescimento vira risco.

Apoiamos sua empresa com planejamento tributário, organização societária e implantação de rotinas gerenciais para escalar com segurança. O objetivo é crescer mantendo controle, conformidade e visão clara de desempenho por unidade e por centro de resultado.

sections.title: Consultative accounting for dealerships, repair shops and service centers
sections.titleHighlight: dealerships, repair shops and service centers
paragraphs: Dealerships and repair shops handle complex routines: sales and after-sales, parts and labor, work orders, warranties, commissions, inventory control and different tax rules per operation. Without aligned finance and accounting, margins are lost in small details and cash flow becomes unpredictable.

Malaquias structures your accounting with a focus on management and results. We integrate tax, accounting and finance to organize processes, improve controls, reduce risks and deliver practical reports that support pricing, inventory turnover and profitability by department.
sections.ctaText: Want to find what’s consuming your margin — and fix it fast?

sections.title: Scale predictably: new locations and standardized routines
paragraphs: Opening a new location, expanding operations or organizing after-sales requires standardization and governance. Without clear routines, you lose control of inventory, costs, commissions and taxes — and growth increases risk.

We support your business with tax planning, corporate structuring and management routines to scale safely. The goal is to grow with control, compliance and clear performance by unit and profit center.

questions.question: Why do dealerships and repair shops need specialized accounting?
questions.answer: Because there are specifics like profit centers (sales/parts/labor), commissions, inventory, warranties and different tax rules. Accounting aligned to operations protects margin and reduces risk.

questions.question: Can you separate results by department (parts, service, sales)?
questions.answer: Yes. We structure profit centers and reports to track profitability by department, unit and channel.

questions.question: How can we improve parts inventory control and turnover?
questions.answer: We support process organization, reconciliations and management reports to reduce tied-up capital, losses and mismatches.

questions.question: Can we reduce taxes without increasing compliance risk?
questions.answer: Yes. With tax planning, correct regime, review of calculations and compliance, you can pay what’s due and avoid overpayment.

questions.question: Do you support multi-unit operations?
questions.answer: Yes. We support groups with standardized routines, unit-level reports and corporate structuring for expansion.
